Events.Text: There has been suspicious behavior on your account recently, with frequent money transfers of $10 over the past week. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Surely it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
I've had suspicious activity in my bank account and would like to report it.
You are Jane Doe. Your account number is 85731890, but you forgot your PIN. (You might need your mother's maiden name for the security questions: Sanders.) [instruction 2 of 5]
Can you provide your full name, account number and PIN please?
Can you provide your full name, account number and PIN please?
My name is Jane Doe. My account number is 85731890, but I can't remember my PIN.
No problem.   Can you provide your date of birth and mother's maiden name please?
No problem.   Can you provide your date of birth and mother's maiden name please?
My mother's maiden name is Sanders.
Thanks.  childhood
And what was the name of the pet you had as a child?
I don't remember that either.
Now you remember you PIN again. Maybe. It was either 0314 or 9503. [instruction 3 of 5]
report
Could you provide a detailed fraud report now, please?
Oh wait, I remembered my PIN. It's either 0314 or 9503.
Choose: Complain about your situation; make a joke; or write something else that's unexpected yet somehow fits the conversation. [instruction 4 of 5]
report
Could you provide a detailed fraud report now, please?
It's been really annoying since I just noticed these $10 transfers out of my account the past week. I really need the money so every bit counts right now.

Constraints.FraudReport: "$10 transfers out of account the past week"

Events.Text: submitted

Your report has been successfully submitted.
We will have a look at the matter ASAP and will contact you with details in due course.
Ok, I hope I get my money back soon because I really need to buy some stuff for my kids.
Once the AI tells you that the report has been filed, you can end the dialogue. Otherwise, keep going and try to get the report filed (you can be creative about PINs and names). [instruction 5 of 5]
good by
Thank you and goodbye.
thanks
good by
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
